name: Responsive Accordion Slider
author: TechKnow Prime

sections.description:
Responsive Accordion Slider is fully resonsive, user-friendly, touch-enabled WordPress plugin having horizonatal and vertical slider layouts.
Responsive Accordion Slider works with any WordPress theme, Switch your slider to different device mode and optimize your content for the resolution. Your site can be enjoyed in any environment, be it a mobile, tablet or desktop.

** Features **

  • Creating Unlimited Accordion Sliders.
  • Horizontal and Vertical Slider Layout.
  • Easily embed shortcode on page or post.
  • 2 Accordion Slider designs.
  • Slider running Forward and Backword direction.
  • Responsive designs.
  • Responsive Slider.
  • Mobile Friendly.

Demo

Check Free Plugin Demo – Click Here
Check Premium Plugin Demo – Click Here

The Accordion Slider Pro is a powerful and versatile tool designed to revolutionize the way you showcase content on your website. With its sleek and modern design, this dynamic slider combines functionality and aesthetics to create an engaging and interactive user experience.

Unleash your creativity and captivate your visitors with the Accordion Slider Pro’s seamless and smooth animation effects. Effortlessly display your images, and text in a visually stunning accordion-style layout that adds depth and dimension to your website. Whether you’re a photographer, a blogger, a creative agency, or an e-commerce store own

Pro Version Feature

  • Responsive Pricing Table
  • Compatible With Elementor Page Builder and Others
  • Fully Responsive.
  • All Browser Support.
  • 12+ Responsive Layouts
  • Lightbox on Title
  • 5 Overlay Effects
  • Background Opacity
  • Mouse Delay
  • Unlimited Images
  • Button Settings
  • Responsive Mode
  • Open Panel Duration
  • Close Panel Duration
  • Navigation Settings
  • Image Shadow Settings
  • Image Border Settings
  • Duplicate Post Option
  • Title Hover Color
  • Multi-Site Supported
  • Highly Customizable
  • Developer Friendly
  • 700+ Google Font
  • Multi-Site Supported
  • Highly Customizable & Developer Friendly

For Faster Support, Features Request, and Bug Reporting

Ask us at Support

sections.installation:
For automatic installation:

The simplest way to install is to click on \’Plugins\’ then \’Add New\’ and type \’Responsive Accordion Slider\’ in the search field then click on install now of respective plugin then click on activate.

For manual installation:

  1. Login to your website and go to the Plugins section of your admin panel.
  2. Click the Add New button.
  3. Click the Upload Plugin.
  4. Click on the Choose file then select the plugin zip file (responsive-accordion-slider.x.x.x.zip) from your computer then click the Install Now button.
  5. You should see a message that the plugin was installed successfully.
  6. Click the Activate Plugin link.
